# sampleCount

**Instance Property**

The number of rows and columns in the layer map.

## Declaration

```swift
var sampleCount: MTLSize { get set }
```

## Discussion

The [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLRasterizationRateLayerDescriptor/sampleCount] property splits the logical viewport coordinate space into a 2D grid of equal-sized cells. Its [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLSize/depth] value is always `0`.

The default value is the same as [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLRasterizationRateLayerDescriptor/maxSampleCount].

## Inspecting the layer rate function parameters

- **maxSampleCount**: The maximum number of rows and columns in the layer map.
- **horizontal**: The horizontal rasterization rates for the layer map’s rows.
- **vertical**: The vertical rasterization rates for the layer map’s rows.
- **MTLRasterizationRateSampleArray**: An array instance that contains rasterization rates.
